limits.title: Betting Limits
limits.depositTool: Deposit limits are set for a specific time frame (daily, weekly, or monthly). You can decrease your deposit limit at any time and the change will take effect immediately. If you choose to increase your deposit limit, it will take effect one week after the request is made. While a limit increase is pending, you will not be able to make further changes.
limits.lossTool: Loss limits are set for a specific time frame (daily, weekly, or monthly). You can decrease your loss limit at any time and the change will take effect immediately. If you choose to increase your loss limit, it will take effect one week after the request is made. While a limit increase is pending, you will not be able to make further changes.

myLimits.error: You cannot edit your limits until the pending change takes effect.

exclusion.title: Self-Exclusion
exclusion.description: By enabling Self-Exclusion you can exclude yourself accessing your account for a selected time frame. Self-Exclusion takes effect from the moment it is set by you, and lasts for any out of the available time frames selected (1 day, 1 week, 1 month, 2 months, 6 months, 1 year, Permanent).
exclusion.sub-description-1: During this period, you will not have access to any betting activities or deposits. However, you will still be able to use all other services. Once the self-exclusion period ends, you may choose to set it again.
exclusion.sub-description-2: By selecting Permanent Self-Exclusion, you will no longer be able to access our services, and your account will be blocked.
exclusion.check: I want to proceed to Self-Exclusion
exclusion.confirmDescription: Once enabled, you will not be able to access your account for the selected period.
